DOC.brief_summary: Will an increase of the dose of mannitol improve the effects on neuromonitoring in patients suffering intracranial hypertension following traumatic brain injury?
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of 2 Doses of Mannitol on Post Traumatic Intracranial Hypertension and Cerebral Monitoring
DOC.detailed_description: traumatic brain injury intracranial hypertension 0,4 g/ kg vs 0,8 g/ kg (randomized) on 20 minutes monitoring: ICP, transcranial doppler, brain pO2, MAP, HR, diuresis, biology duration: 2 hours
DOC.criteria: adults severe traumatic brain injury intracranial hypertension requiring mannitol administration impeding neurosurgery hemodynamic or respiratory severe failure
